query:
UPDATE island_guides 
SET topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'ü¶á Flying Fox Watching', 'description', 'Observe thousands of flying foxes in their natural habitat, unique wildlife experience'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'üê† Snorkeling & Marine Life', 'description', 'Excellent snorkeling with rays, sharks, and tropical fish'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', '‚ú® Bioluminescence Viewing', 'description', 'Magical glowing plankton at night, spectacular natural phenomenon'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'üèñÔ∏è Beach Relaxation', 'description', 'Peaceful beaches, calm waters, perfect for unwinding'),
  JSON_OBJECT('title', 'üö¥ Island Exploration', 'description', 'Walk around island, visit local shops, experience island life')
),
foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'üçΩÔ∏è Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Traditional Maldivian cuisine and fresh seafood'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', '‚òï Cafes', 'description', 'Tea, coffee, and light refreshments')
),
faq = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'ü¶á When can I see flying foxes?', 'answer', 'Best at dusk when they fly out to feed, visible year-round.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'üê† Is snorkeling good?', 'answer', 'Excellent! Pristine reefs with diverse marine life directly from beaches.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', '‚ú® Is bioluminescence guaranteed?', 'answer', 'Best during calm nights with minimal moon, June-September optimal.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'üí∞ What is the budget?', 'answer', 'Budget travelers: $45-75/day. Mid-range: $90-130/day.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('question', 'üåä Is it safe?', 'answer', 'Yes, very safe. Peaceful island with friendly locals.')
)
WHERE name = 'Omadhoo'
